Sayid and Desmond hit a bit of turbulence on the way to the freighter, which causes Desmond to experience some unexpected side effects.

It looks like this weeks release is again smaller than your "average"  720p MP4 file.  As before, as with all the HD stuff (inc. Heroes S2) I have used the same settings on the same program.  I am guessing that the recent update to either iTunes (and Quicktime) and/or VisualHub that is getting a smaller files at the same quality.  If anyone can shed some light on this that would be great.
